name: Shubh Mangal Saavdhan
review:
A hilarious comedy movie that also shows how humour can be decently created from the unspoken topics. Bhumi Pednekar, Ayushmann Khurrana and all other characters shine throughout.

Storyline Rating: 3

Acting Rating: 3
Bhumi Pednekar: 3
Ayushmann Khurrana: 3

Direction Rating: 3

Music Rating: 2

Cinematography: 2

Editing: 3
